questions.question: 1. What effect would treating an axon with TTX have on an action potential?

answers.a: Action potential observed with high amplitude
answers.b: Action potential observed with low amplitude

questions.question: 2. How would TEA affect the action potential?

answers.b: It would become shorter with more delay
answers.d: It would be longer and would not have an undershoot.

questions.question: 3. Why does TTX does not have effect on puffer fish?

answers.a: Because puffer fish sodium channel is insensitive to TTX
answers.b: Amino acid sequence of sodium channel is different

questions.question: 4. Drug X, when applied to a nerve axon, results in both a gradual decrease in the amplitude of individual action potentials and a depolarization of the resting potential, both of which develop over a period of several hours. The drug is most likely:

answers.d: Blocking the process of sodium inactivation
